description: One of the biggest companies in Matheuchelles' is searching for a place for their new factory in our region. They consider a certain place in Kachakonya as one of their main options, but they want to ensure preferential treatment first, such as tax exemptions, before they make a final decision.

options.description: It would be unfair to our own companies if we give them special treatment.
Let's negotiate with them, but not at all costs.
Offer them the best possible conditions.

title: Foreign investment
